author: mbandrews
body:
-     Add TimingTask sequence to EcalMonitorTask (for offline dqm)
-     Consolidate timing windows in Timing Client As requested by ECAL trigger group:
-     Add TTF4 Occupancy plot
-     Add TT Masking status plot
-     Add TTF4 v Masking status plot
-     Include TT records for EE masking

Based on 80X PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13917
title: Add TimingTask sequence. Add TTF plots.
